---
title: Summary Stats
format: pdf
---


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false


library(tidyverse)

data <- read_csv("../data/data.csv") |>
    select(-...1, -country, -country_text_id, -country_id, -year, -historical_date)

summaryStats <- function(variable) {
  summary(data[[variable]])
}

summary_stats <- list() 

variables <- colnames(data)

for (var in variables) {
  summary_stats[[var]] <- summaryStats(var)
}

print(summary_stats)

```
